meta.description: The store is located at Ronnebygatan 1 in Malmö and you can find Ronnebygatan near Folkets park in the charming area St: Knut.

wayfinding.header: Welcome to our little organic store on the corner
wayfinding.p-1: The store is located at Ronnebygatan 1 in Malmö. Ronnebygatan can be found next to Folkets park in the charming area of St: Knut. At the bus stop Malmö Folkets Park, a stone's throw from the store, buses number 5 and 32 stop. At Folkets Park, there is also a bicycle parking station

wayfinding.p-2: .. and this is how it looks when you've arrived:
